Name: Magical Essence
Description: A bottle of magical Essence. It shifts and sparkles in the light

DescriptionLocalization.es: Una botella de esencia mágica. Cambia y brilla a la luz
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 마법의 에센스 병. 그것은 빛의 변화와 반짝입니다
DescriptionLocalization.de: Eine Flasche magischer Essenz. Es verschiebt und funkelt im Licht
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Une bouteille d'essence magique. Ça change et scintille dans la lumière
DescriptionLocalization.hu: Egy üveg varázslatos lényeg. A fényben eltolódik és csillog
DescriptionLocalization.it: Una bottiglia di essenza magica. Si sposta e brilla nella luce
DescriptionLocalization.ja: 魔法の本質のボトル。それは光の中でシフトして輝きます
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Uma garrafa de essência mágica. Ele muda e brilha na luz
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Бутылка магической сущности. Это смещается и сверкает в свете
DescriptionLocalization.tr: Bir şişe büyülü öz. Işıkta değişir ve parlar
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 一瓶神奇的本质。它在光线下移动和闪闪发光
